name: places/ChIJq6qaijdewokR4I6r9VUoetE
formattedAddress: 62 W 48th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 62 W 48th St 2nd Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
READ*
I went in for a regular cleaning, majority of the staff is great. They said they will submit to my insurance an approval for a deep clean, I asked how much it is and they said "you dont want to know, we will tell the insurance to cover it". A few days/weeks later they called saying my insurance is COVERING it and I made my appointment.

I go in for my appointment & they take me straight to the back, no forms, no sign in - anything. They do the deep clean and it took around 15-20 minutes. Only then after they come up to me saying I owe $150, my question to them was why was I not told this before I sat down. They had some note in their system saying I was aware of this co pay. If I knew, I would not have minded paying but I am not sure who they spoke to that they made aware, I did not even bring my card to pay this.

The dentist said I am wasting his time and they walked out of the room angry. I was not even shouting or yelling, I definitely raised my voice in concern to why they did not tell me about this charge OR charge me BEFORE the service. EVERY dr I go to charges my copay before I sit down.

It is a joint practice, the lady dentist is very nice! She waived my co pay.
The guy dentist, IS VERY RUDE. I asked him a question and he said I am wasting his time? I now am not upset over the $150 cause they verbally told me they waived it, but I am upset cause never in my life has a medical professional treated me that way.

originalText.text: Dr. Temkin is an excellent dentist!  She makes you feel very cared for and comfortable!

text.text: Dr. Temkin is an excellent dentist!  She makes you feel very cared for and comfortable!
